actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a stamp to commemorate the one-hundredth anniversary of the merit system in Federal employment.

summary.text: Directs the Postal Service to issue a postage stamp to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the merit system in Federal employment. Requires the Postal Service to determine an appropriate design for such stamp after consultation with the directors of the National Association of Retired Federal Employees. Requires that the stamp be placed on sale on January 16, 1983, the 100th anniversary of the Civil Service Act.
